categories.name: Chakna & Bar Bites
categories.description: Perfect accompaniments for your drinks, with an Indian twist.

categories.name: Tandoori Delights
categories.description: Smoky and flavorful small plates from our authentic tandoor.

categories.name: Starters (Appetizers)
categories.description: Flavorful beginnings to your dining experience, beyond typical bar snacks.

categories.name: Main Course (Indian Curries & Breads)
categories.description: Hearty and aromatic main dishes served with traditional Indian breads.

categories.name: Signature Cocktails
categories.description: Our mixologist's unique Indian-inspired alcoholic creations.

categories.name: Whiskey & Malts
categories.description: A curated selection of fine whiskies, bourbons, and single malts (served 30ml/60ml).

categories.name: Beers & Ciders
categories.description: A range of domestic, imported, and craft beers and ciders.

categories.name: Wines
categories.description: Selected red, white, rosé, and sparkling wines (served by glass/bottle).

categories.name: Mocktails & Refreshers
categories.description: Creative non-alcoholic beverages, fresh juices, and traditional coolers.

categories.name: Soft Drinks & Mixers
categories.description: Standard soft drinks, aerated beverages, and mixers.

dishes.name: Masala Peanuts
dishes.description: Roasted peanuts tossed with chopped onions, tomatoes, green chillies, chaat masala, and a squeeze of lemon.

dishes.name: Cheesy Garlic Bread with Jalapeños
dishes.description: Crispy toasted bread topped with molten cheese, garlic butter, and spicy jalapeño slices.

dishes.name: Spicy Chicken Popcorn
dishes.description: Bite-sized chicken pieces marinated in fiery spices, fried till golden and crisp.

dishes.name: Fish Fingers with Tartar Sauce
dishes.description: Crispy fried fish batons served with a creamy, tangy tartar dip.

dishes.name: Hara Bhara Kebab (Bar Snack Style)
dishes.description: Spinach, peas, and potato patties infused with Indian spices, shallow fried, served as small bites.

dishes.name: Chilli Cheese Toast
dishes.description: Classic comfort snack - toasted bread topped with gooey cheese and zesty green chillies.

dishes.name: Hariyali Paneer Tikka
dishes.description: Cottage cheese cubes marinated in a vibrant green paste of mint, coriander, and spices, char-grilled.

dishes.name: Murgh Seekh Kebab
dishes.description: Minced chicken blended with aromatic spices, skewered and grilled to perfection in the tandoor.

dishes.name: Tandoori Aloo Chaat
dishes.description: Smoky tandoor-roasted baby potatoes tossed in tangy chaat masala and chutneys.

dishes.name: Achari Fish Tikka
dishes.description: Succulent fish pieces marinated in tangy pickle spices and yogurt, grilled in the tandoor.

dishes.name: Mutton Galouti Kebab
dishes.description: Melt-in-the-mouth minced mutton kebabs, delicately spiced and pan-fried, served on ulte tawe ka paratha.

dishes.name: Tandoori Mushroom Tikka
dishes.description: Button mushrooms marinated in spiced yogurt and char-grilled to perfection.

dishes.name: Dahi Ke Kebab
dishes.description: Yogurt patties blended with spices and herbs, delicately fried. A creamy delight.

dishes.name: Amritsari Fish Fry
dishes.description: Spicy battered fish, deep-fried till golden and crisp, served with mint chutney and lemon wedges.

dishes.name: Chicken 65
dishes.description: Spicy, deep-fried chicken bites originating from Chennai, tossed with curry leaves and green chillies.

dishes.name: Paneer Pakora
dishes.description: Cottage cheese slices dipped in spiced gram flour batter and deep fried.

dishes.name: Butter Chicken
dishes.description: Classic creamy tomato and butter based chicken curry, finished with fenugreek.

dishes.name: Dal Makhani
dishes.description: Slow-cooked black lentils and kidney beans in a rich, buttery, creamy sauce.

dishes.name: Paneer Butter Masala
dishes.description: Cottage cheese cubes in a rich, mildly sweet, creamy tomato and cashew gravy.

dishes.name: Mutton Rogan Josh
dishes.description: Aromatic lamb curry, slow-cooked in a gravy of browned onions, yogurt, garlic, ginger and aromatic spices.

dishes.name: Garlic Naan
dishes.description: Soft Indian leavened flatbread topped with garlic and butter.

dishes.name: Tandoori Roti
dishes.description: Whole wheat unleavened bread cooked in a tandoor.

dishes.name: Laccha Paratha
dishes.description: Layered flaky whole wheat bread, cooked with ghee or oil.

dishes.name: Butter Naan
dishes.description: Soft Indian leavened flatbread generously brushed with butter.

dishes.name: Imli Mojito
dishes.description: A tantalizing Indian twist! White rum, tamarind pulp, mint, lime, sugar, topped with soda.

dishes.name: Paan-tastic Martini
dishes.description: Vodka infused with the flavors of paan (betel leaf), gulkand, and a hint of cardamom.

dishes.name: Masala Chai Old Fashioned
dishes.description: Whiskey infused with masala chai spices, bitters, and a touch of jaggery syrup.

dishes.name: Kala Khatta Gola Spike
dishes.description: Childhood nostalgia with an adult kick! Vodka, kala khatta syrup, chaat masala, lime, and soda.

dishes.name: Gulab Fizz
dishes.description: Elegant and aromatic: Gin, rose syrup, fresh lime juice, topped with sparkling water and edible rose petals.

dishes.name: Coconut & Cardamom Daiquiri
dishes.description: A tropical Indian twist on a classic. White rum, creamy coconut, fragrant cardamom, and zesty lime.

dishes.name: Whiskey Sour
dishes.description: A perfect balance of whiskey, fresh lemon juice, sugar, and optionally, egg white.

dishes.name: Long Island Iced Tea (LIIT)
dishes.description: A potent mix of five white spirits, lime juice, and a splash of cola.

dishes.name: Cosmopolitan
dishes.description: Vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and freshly squeezed lime juice. Chic and tart.

dishes.name: Margarita
dishes.description: The quintessential tequila cocktail with triple sec and fresh lime juice, served with a salt rim.

dishes.name: Negroni
dishes.description: A perfectly balanced Italian classic: equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.

dishes.name: Pina Colada
dishes.description: A sweet and creamy tropical delight made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice.

dishes.name: Johnnie Walker Black Label
dishes.description: A rich, complex, and incredibly well-balanced blended Scotch whisky.

dishes.name: Jack Daniel's Old No. 7
dishes.description: Classic Tennessee whiskey with a smooth character and notes of caramel and vanilla.

dishes.name: Paul John Brilliance
dishes.description: An unpeated Indian single malt with notes of honey, fruit, and a hint of spice.

dishes.name: Amrut Fusion Single Malt
dishes.description: Award-winning Indian single malt with notes of peat, fruit, and spice. A connoisseur's choice.

dishes.name: Glenfiddich 12 YO
dishes.description: A classic Speyside single malt Scotch whisky, renowned for its sweet and fruity notes.

dishes.name: Jameson Irish Whiskey
dishes.description: Smooth and versatile Irish whiskey, triple distilled for a balanced flavor.

dishes.name: Kingfisher Ultra (Bottle)
dishes.description: A smooth, crisp, and refreshing Indian lager, easy to drink.

dishes.name: Hoegaarden Witbier (Draught/Bottle)
dishes.description: The original Belgian wheat beer, with notes of coriander and orange peel.

dishes.name: Simba Wit (Bottle)
dishes.description: A flavorful Indian craft wheat beer with hints of orange zest, coriander and lemongrass.

dishes.name: Bira 91 White (Bottle/Draught)
dishes.description: A popular Indian craft wheat beer, cloudy and refreshing with citrus and coriander notes.

dishes.name: Corona Extra (Bottle)
dishes.description: A crisp, pale Mexican lager, often served with a lime wedge.

dishes.name: Strongbow Apple Cider (Bottle)
dishes.description: A crisp and refreshing apple cider, perfect for a change of pace.

dishes.name: Fratelli Sangiovese Bianco (Glass/Bottle)
dishes.description: A crisp and refreshing Indian white wine with fruity notes. India's first Sangiovese white.

dishes.name: Big Banyan Merlot (Glass/Bottle)
dishes.description: A smooth Indian red wine with aromas of dark cherries, plums, and a hint of spice.

dishes.name: Chandon Brut (Bottle)
dishes.description: A premium Indian sparkling wine with crisp apple and citrus notes.

dishes.name: Sula Dindori Reserve Shiraz (Glass/Bottle)
dishes.description: A full-bodied Indian red wine with rich berry flavors and hints of spice.

dishes.name: York Arros (Bottle)
dishes.description: A premium Indian reserve blend of Shiraz and Cabernet Sauvignon, barrel-aged.

dishes.name: Jacob's Creek Chardonnay (Glass/Bottle)
dishes.description: A popular Australian white wine with notes of melon, peach, and a touch of oak.

dishes.name: Aam Panna Sparkler
dishes.description: Refreshing raw mango drink with mint, roasted cumin, black salt, and a splash of soda.

dishes.name: Berry Blast Smoothie
dishes.description: A healthy blend of mixed berries, yogurt, and a touch of honey.

dishes.name: Classic Nimbu Pani Shikanji
dishes.description: The ultimate Indian lemonade with a twist of black salt, cumin, and sugar/salt.

dishes.name: Virgin Mojito
dishes.description: The classic refreshing mix of mint, lime, sugar, and soda, minus the rum.

dishes.name: Spiced Guava Cooler
dishes.description: Sweet guava juice with a spicy kick from Tabasco, balanced with lime and chaat masala.

dishes.name: Kokum Sherbet
dishes.description: A traditional Indian summer cooler made from Kokum fruit, known for its tangy and digestive properties.

dishes.name: Bottled Water (1L)
dishes.description: Packaged drinking water (Brand subject to availability).

dishes.name: Aerated Beverages (Pepsi/Coke/Diet Coke/7Up/Mirinda)
dishes.description: Choice of popular carbonated soft drinks (Can/Bottle).

dishes.name: Club Soda / Sparkling Water
dishes.description: Plain carbonated water, perfect as a mixer or on its own.

dishes.name: Tonic Water
dishes.description: Carbonated water with quinine, a classic mixer for gin and other spirits.

dishes.name: Fresh Lime Soda (Sweet/Salted/Mixed)
dishes.description: Refreshing fizzy lime drink, made to your preference of sweet, salted, or both.

tags.popular: Frequently ordered items by our guests.
tags.hot: Currently trending and in high demand.
tags.chef's special: Signature dishes specially curated by our chef.
tags.bartender's special: Unique cocktail creations from our expert mixologist.
tags.spicy: Contains a significant level of spice.
tags.new arrival: Fresh additions to our menu selection.
tags.light bite: Smaller portions, perfect for a light snack.
tags.strong: Indicates a beverage with higher alcoholic content.
tags.blended scotch: Smooth and complex blended Scotch whiskies.
tags.wheat beer: Smooth and often fruity wheat-based beers.
tags.domestic: Locally produced or nationally recognized brands.
tags.craft beer: Artisanally brewed beers with unique flavors.
tags.sparkling wine: Bubbly wines for celebrations or enjoyment.
tags.unique: A distinct and uncommon flavor experience.
tags.bold flavor: A strong and impactful taste profile.
tags.quick bite: Fast and easy options for a snack.
tags.tangy: Offers a zesty and tart flavor profile.
tags.smoky flavor: Characterized by a distinct smoky taste from tandoor or grilling.
tags.creamy: Smooth and rich texture, often in cocktails, curries or desserts.
tags.bitter-sweet: A balanced profile of bitterness and sweetness.
tags.cider: Beverages made from fermented fruit juice, typically apple.
tags.reserve: Indicates a higher quality wine, often aged longer.
tags.spicy mocktail: Non-alcoholic drinks with a notable spicy kick.
tags.mildly spiced: Subtly flavored with spices, not overwhelmingly hot.
tags.melts in mouth: Food with a very soft and tender texture.
tags.south indian: Cuisine or flavors originating from South India.
tags.curry: Spiced dishes, typically with a sauce or gravy.
tags.all-time favorite: A universally loved and classic dish, consistently popular.
tags.breads: Various types of Indian and other breads to accompany meals.
tags.accompaniment: Served alongside main dishes to complete the meal.
tags.mixer: Non-alcoholic beverages commonly used to mix with spirits.
tags.bitter: Beverages with a distinct bitter taste profile, like tonic water.
tags.customizable: Can be prepared according to guest preference (e.g., sweet/salted).
tags.crispy: Food item with a delightfully crisp texture.
tags.aromatic: Dishes with a strong, pleasant aroma from spices and herbs.
